name: Rail's basement
description:
Description 

This is a story driven game about your escape from a crazy man the says his name is Rail. The game play is super simple, and all you have to do is to go through the right doors.

Controls

This game is mainly played with the mouse as an classic point and click game.

Important keyboard shortcuts

Escape: Quits the game

R: Restart the game

B: Go back to the last checkpoint in the story. (If you do not hear what Rail says in the rooms with the doors, you can also use this button) 

Good luck and have fun

SOUND IS AN IMPORTANT PART OF THIS GAME Warning this game is NOT children friendly.
